title: Zuhaai
author: Zuhaai
content: I Need 100k$ Perfect  Money Every Day.. I Will Pay You In Usdt I am with you if you offer me good percentage.. Suppose you give me 1050 Perfect  Money and I will Give you 1000 usdtMinimum five thousand $ exchange.. Of course every transaction will be through escrow BitcoinTalk Verify MemberIf you agree to these terms please visit my inbox>>> Telegram @otpusd

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Not sure if someone here will be willing to give a good percentage on top of paying the escrow fees. My feeling is it should be the other way round since you are in need of the exchangeHave you tried to look at Bestchange (https://www.bestchange.com/tether-trc20-to-perfectmoney-usd.html)? Not a very good deal of 1.050 USD PM that you expect, but I can see offers starting from 1.041 USD PM, that is if you don't mind KYC that most of those exchangers may require.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on October 17, 2023, 06:00:52 AMWho pays the escrow fee ?Who will escrow $100k Perfect Money Every Day? I do not think that Perfect Money will allow an average joe to accept this money daily without asking him about the source of the money.In his previous posts, you will find that the user had PAYONEER and was looking for USDT. With some one-line posts, it is difficult to think that he would want an activity of about 3 million dollars per month.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Zuhaai on September 19, 2023, 11:26:10 AMI Need 100k$ Perfect  Money Every Day.. I Will Pay You In Usdt I am with you if you offer me good percentage.. Suppose you give me 1050 Perfect  Money and I will Give you 1000 usdtMinimum five thousand $ exchange.. Of course every transaction will be through escrow BitcoinTalk Verify MemberIf you agree to these terms please visit my inbox>>> Telegram @otpusdHow do you classify a Bitcointalk verified member, are you in anyway talking of reputable DT member? Well I will tell you that this could be very hard if you are to provide escrow and again the transaction must first be initiated by you and not the reputable DT member because it's very hard to trust a newbie for a huge transaction of such amount.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on October 22, 2023, 11:17:24 AMHow do you classify a Bitcointalk verified member, are you in anyway talking of reputable DT member? English is probably not his native languageBut even with the conditions OP set. No one in their right mind is going to think of trading with him unless he makes a good offer because he is the one in need of the funds on top of him having a newbie rank.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: 100k a day with Perfect Money is impossible.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 22, 2023, 11:36:49 PMQuote from: Adbitco on October 22, 2023, 11:17:24 AMHow do you classify a Bitcointalk verified member, are you in anyway talking of reputable DT member? English is probably not his native languageBut even with the conditions OP set. No one in their right mind is going to think of trading with him unless he makes a good offer because he is the one in need of the funds on top of him having a newbie rank.You are absolutely correct mate most times it baffles me seeing some newbies trying to entrapped old member or those whom they think has important funds to come trade with them, I can't just see myself foolishly want to go trade with newbies whom I have no source and origins not even identifying himself with at least a local board maybe people can deal with him or her, because even though he offer a very cheaper rate people might still tuned down his offer because of ranks.
